name: Flamewick
description:
Flamewick is a"Game Jam" made in under 48 hours. It is a tower defense game, based around protecting a precious luminous gem from the attacking moths.

Move with 'W,A,S,D'. Place candles using 'E' to shoot the moths but be careful the candles don't last forever and can be destroyed by a single moth.

(Play in fullscreen if playing in browser)

Music by Alectronix https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRXpjy7KA6_-IQ8JPv59DBA
